verses.translation: Is there disease in their hearts? Or have they doubted? Or do they fear that ALLAH will be unjust to them, or His Messenger? Rather, it is they who are the wrongdoers [i.e., the unjust].

verses.text: إِنَّمَا كَانَ قَوْلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذَا دُعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: The only statement of the [true] believers when they are called to ALLAH and His Messenger to judge between them is that they say, "We hear and we obey." And those are the successful.

verses.text: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخْشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقْهِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.translation: And whoever obeys ALLAH and His Messenger and fears ALLAH and is conscious of Him - it is those who are the attainers.

verses.text: ۞ وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ لَئِنْ أَمَرْتَهُمْ لَيَخْرُجُنَّ ۖ قُل لَّا تُقْسِمُوا۟ ۖ طَاعَةٌ مَّعْرُوفَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they swear by ALLAH their strongest oaths that if you ordered them, they would go forth [in ALLAH's cause]. Say, "Do not swear. [Such] obedience is known. Indeed, ALLAH is [fully] Aware of that which you do."

verses.text: قُلْ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَعَلَيْكُم مَّا حُمِّلْتُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوهُ تَهْتَدُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: Say, "Obey ALLAH and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon him is only that [duty] with which he has been charged, and upon you is that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And there is not upon the Messenger except the [responsibility for] clear notification."

verses.text: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمَا ٱسْتَخْلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ دِينَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى ٱرْتَضَىٰ لَهُمْ وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَوْفِهِمْ أَمْنًا ۚ يَعْبُدُونَنِى لَا يُشْرِكُونَ بِى شَيْـًٔا ۚ وَمَن كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
verses.translation: ALLAH has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them [therein] their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, [for] they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient.

verses.text: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: And establish prayer and give zakāh and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.

verses.text: لَا تَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure [to ALLAH] upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لِيَسْتَـْٔذِنكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَبْلُغُوا۟ ٱلْحُلُمَ مِنكُمْ ثَلَـٰثَ مَرَّٰتٍ ۚ مِّن قَبْلِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْفَجْرِ وَحِينَ تَضَعُونَ ثِيَابَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظَّهِيرَةِ وَمِنۢ بَعْدِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْعِشَآءِ ۚ ثَلَـٰثُ عَوْرَٰتٍ لَّكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَا عَلَيْهِمْ جُنَاحٌۢ بَعْدَهُنَّ ۚ طَوَّٰفُونَ عَلَيْكُم بَعْضُكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering] at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing [for rest] at noon and after the night prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these [periods], for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does ALLAH make clear to you the verses [i.e., His ordinances]; and ALLAH is Knowing and Wise.

verses.text: وَإِذَا بَلَغَ ٱلْأَطْفَـٰلُ مِنكُمُ ٱلْحُلُمَ فَلْيَسْتَـْٔذِنُوا۟ كَمَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission [at all times] as those before them have done. Thus does ALLAH make clear to you His verses; and ALLAH is Knowing and Wise.

verses.text: وَٱلْقَوَٰعِدُ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ٱلَّـٰتِى لَا يَرْجُونَ نِكَاحًا فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْهِنَّ جُنَاحٌ أَن يَضَعْنَ ثِيَابَهُنَّ غَيْرَ مُتَبَرِّجَـٰتٍۭ بِزِينَةٍ ۖ وَأَن يَسْتَعْفِفْنَ خَيْرٌ لَّهُنَّ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments [but] not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them. And ALLAH is Hearing and Knowing.

verses.text: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِنۢ بُيُوتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ ءَابَآئِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ إِخْوَٰنِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخَوَٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَعْمَـٰمِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ عَمَّـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخْوَٰلِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ خَـٰلَـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكْتُم مَّفَاتِحَهُۥٓ أَوْ صَدِيقِكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ جَمِيعًا أَوْ أَشْتَاتًا ۚ فَإِذَا دَخَلْتُم بُيُوتًا فَسَلِّمُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ تَحِيَّةً مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ مُبَـٰرَكَةً طَيِّبَةً ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: There is not upon the blind [any] constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess or [from the house] of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from ALLAH, blessed and good. Thus does ALLAH make clear to you the verses [of ordinance] that you may understand.

verses.text: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَإِذَا كَانُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ جَامِعٍ لَّمْ يَذْهَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُوهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُونَكَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ فَإِذَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِبَعْضِ شَأْنِهِمْ فَأْذَن لِّمَن شِئْتَ مِنْهُمْ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمُ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: The believers are only those who believe in ALLAH and His Messenger and, when they are [meeting] with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, [O Muḥammad] - those are the ones who believe in ALLAH and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission due to something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of ALLAH. Indeed, ALLAH is Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.text: لَّا تَجْعَلُوا۟ دُعَآءَ ٱلرَّسُولِ بَيْنَكُمْ كَدُعَآءِ بَعْضِكُم بَعْضًا ۚ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَسَلَّلُونَ مِنكُمْ لِوَاذًا ۚ فَلْيَحْذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُخَالِفُونَ عَنْ أَمْرِهِۦٓ أَن تُصِيبَهُمْ فِتْنَةٌ أَوْ يُصِيبَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Do not make [your] calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already ALLAH knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from his [i.e., the Prophet's] order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment.

verses.text: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ وَيَوْمَ يُرْجَعُونَ إِلَيْهِ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ
verses.translation: Unquestionably, to ALLAH belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you [stand] and [knows] the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And ALLAH is Knowing of all things.

verses.text: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
verses.translation: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٌ فِى ٱلْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination.

verses.text: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًا وَلَا حَيَوٰةً وَلَا نُشُورًا
verses.translation: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.

verses.text: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءُو ظُلْمًا وَزُورًا
verses.translation: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur’ān] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.

verses.text: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ٱكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."

verses.text: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.translation: Say, [O Muḥammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۙ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا
verses.translation: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?

verses.text: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًا مَّسْحُورًا
verses.translation: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."

verses.text: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ فَضَلُّوا۟ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.

verses.text: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًۢا
verses.translation: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.

verses.text: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.

verses.text: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا تَغَيُّظًا وَزَفِيرًا
verses.translation: When it [i.e., the Hellfire] sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring.

verses.text: وَإِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مَكَانًا ضَيِّقًا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا۟ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction.

verses.text: لَّا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًا وَٰحِدًا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."

verses.text: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۚ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَآءً وَمَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.

verses.text: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَـٰلِدِينَ ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًا مَّسْـُٔولًا
verses.translation: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested.

verses.text: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِى هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
verses.translation: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides ALLAH and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way?"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِى لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَـٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بُورًا
verses.translation: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies [i.e., protectors]. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined."

verses.text: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًا وَلَا نَصْرًا ۚ وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۗ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: And We did not send before you, [O Muḥammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing.

verses.text: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا ۗ لَقَدِ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَعَتَوْ عُتُوًّا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence.

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشْرَىٰ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا
verses.translation: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."

verses.text: وَقَدِمْنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ مِنْ عَمَلٍ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هَبَآءً مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: And We will approach [i.e., regard] what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.

verses.text: أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَيْرٌ مُّسْتَقَرًّا وَأَحْسَنُ مَقِيلًا
verses.translation: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.

verses.text: وَيَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلْغَمَـٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.

verses.text: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ وَكَانَ يَوْمًا عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرًا
verses.translation: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.

verses.text: وَيَوْمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْهِ يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى ٱتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.

verses.text: يَـٰوَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.

verses.text: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ ٱلذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَنِى ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ خَذُولًا
verses.translation: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."

verses.text: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًا
verses.translation: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur’ān as [a thing] abandoned."

verses.text: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّا مِّنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًا وَنَصِيرًا
verses.translation: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper.

verses.text: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ جُمْلَةً وَٰحِدَةً ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلْنَـٰهُ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur’ān not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly.

verses.text: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they do not come to you with an example [i.e., argument] except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ وَزِيرًا
verses.translation: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.

verses.text: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًا
verses.translation: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.

verses.text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا۟ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةً ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.

verses.text: وَعَادًا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَأَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۢا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: And [We destroyed] ʿAad and Thamūd and the companions of the well and many generations between them.

verses.text: وَكُلًّا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ ۖ وَكُلًّا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًا
verses.translation: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَى ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَرَوْنَهَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًا
verses.translation: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil [i.e., stones]. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: And when they see you, [O Muḥammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom ALLAH has sent as a messenger?

verses.text: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوْلَآ أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?

verses.text: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.

verses.text: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: Then We [retract and] hold it with Us for a brief grasp.

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًا
verses.translation: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً طَهُورًا
verses.translation: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy [i.e., rainfall], and We send down from the sky pure water

verses.text: لِّنُحْـِۧىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا
verses.translation: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.

verses.text: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ نَّذِيرًا
verses.translation: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.

verses.text: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَجَـٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with it [i.e., the Qur’ān] a great striving.

verses.text: ۞ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًا وَحِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا
verses.translation: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas [i.e., bodies of water], one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: And it is He who has created from water [i.e., semen] a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].

verses.text: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًا
verses.translation: But they worship rather than ALLAH that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].

verses.text: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
verses.translation: And We have not sent you, [O Muḥammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.

verses.text: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way."

verses.text: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْحَىِّ ٱلَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [ALLAH] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, [fully] Aware -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَسْـَٔلْ بِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
verses.translation: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed [i.e., the Prophet (ﷺ)].

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًا ۩
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion.

verses.text: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًا وَقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا
verses.translation: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةً لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًا
verses.translation: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude.

verses.text: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا
verses.translation: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًا وَقِيَـٰمًا
verses.translation: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
verses.translation: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;

verses.text: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
verses.translation: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا۟ وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًا
verses.translation: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًا
verses.translation: And those who do not invoke with ALLAH another deity or kill the soul which ALLAH has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.

verses.text: يُضَـٰعَفْ لَهُ ٱلْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا
verses.translation: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -

verses.text: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ حَسَنَـٰتٍ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.translation: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them ALLAH will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is ALLAH Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.text: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابًا
verses.translation: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to ALLAH with [accepted] repentance.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِٱللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا۟ كِرَامًا
verses.translation: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا۟ عَلَيْهَا صُمًّا وَعُمْيَانًا
verses.translation: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَٱجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
verses.translation: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us a leader [i.e., example] for the righteous."

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةً وَسَلَـٰمًا
verses.translation: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace,

verses.text: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
verses.translation: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.

verses.text: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًۢا
verses.translation: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so it [i.e., your denial] is going to be adherent.

verses.text: طسٓمٓ
verses.translation: Ṭā, Seen, Meem.

verses.text: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: These are the verses of the clear Book.

verses.text: لَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Perhaps, [O Muḥammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.

verses.text: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ
verses.translation: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.

verses.text: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: And no mention [i.e., revelation] comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.

verses.text: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.translation: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -

verses.text: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ أَلَا يَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear ALLAH?"

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me

verses.text: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ
verses.translation: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.

verses.text: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.translation: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."

verses.text: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: [ALLAH] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.

verses.text: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,

verses.text: أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.translation: [Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"

verses.text: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?

verses.text: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."

verses.text: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray [i.e., ignorant].

verses.text: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me judgement [i.e., wisdom and prophet hood] and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.

verses.text: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.translation: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"

verses.text: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"

verses.text: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."

verses.text: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥٓ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"

verses.text: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."

verses.text: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."

verses.text: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."

verses.text: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."

verses.text: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَىْءٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "Even if I brought you something [i.e., proof] manifest?"

verses.text: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."

verses.text: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.

verses.text: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.translation: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.

verses.text: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.

verses.text: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.translation: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers

verses.text: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."

verses.text: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَـٰتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.

verses.text: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate.

verses.text: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.translation: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"

verses.text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.translation: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"

verses.text: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."

verses.text: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
verses.translation: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."

verses.text: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.translation: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."

verses.text: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.translation: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.

verses.text: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَـٰجِدِينَ
verses.translation: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to ALLAH].

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,

verses.text: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ
verses.translation: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."

verses.text: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him [i.e., Moses] before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.

verses.text: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."

verses.text: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.translation: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."

verses.text: فَأَرْسَلَ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَشِرْذِمَةٌ قَلِيلُونَ
verses.translation: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَنَا لَغَآئِظُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, they are enraging us,

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَجَمِيعٌ حَـٰذِرُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, we are a cautious society..."

verses.text: فَأَخْرَجْنَـٰهُم مِّن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: So We removed them from gardens and springs

verses.text: وَكُنُوزٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: And treasures and honorable station -

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.translation: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.

verses.text: فَأَتْبَعُوهُم مُّشْرِقِينَ
verses.translation: So they pursued them at sunrise.

verses.text: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
verses.translation: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"

verses.text: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."

verses.text: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.

verses.text: وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: And We advanced thereto the others [i.e., the pursuers].

verses.text: وَأَنجَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We drowned the others.

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.translation: And recite to them the news of Abraham,

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."

verses.text: قَالَ هَلْ يَسْمَعُونَكُمْ إِذْ تَدْعُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?

verses.text: أَوْ يَنفَعُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَضُرُّونَ
verses.translation: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."

verses.text: قَالَ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,

verses.text: أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمُ ٱلْأَقْدَمُونَ
verses.translation: You and your ancient forefathers?

verses.text: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَنِى فَهُوَ يَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِى هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِى وَيَسْقِينِ
verses.translation: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ
verses.translation: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِى يُمِيتُنِى ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ
verses.translation: And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."

verses.text: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.

verses.text: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And grant me a mention [i.e., reputation] of honor among later generations.

verses.text: وَٱجْعَلْنِى مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.

verses.text: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.

verses.text: وَلَا تُخْزِنِى يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -

verses.text: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: But only one who comes to ALLAH with a sound heart."

verses.text: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.

verses.text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِلْغَاوِينَ
verses.translation: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,

verses.text: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship

verses.text: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Other than ALLAH? Can they help you or help themselves?"

verses.text: فَكُبْكِبُوا۟ فِيهَا هُمْ وَٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
verses.translation: So they will be overturned into it [i.e., Hellfire], they and the deviators

verses.text: وَجُنُودُ إِبْلِيسَ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ وَهُمْ فِيهَا يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: They will say while they dispute therein,

verses.text: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: "By ALLAH, we were indeed in manifest error

verses.text: إِذْ نُسَوِّيكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَضَلَّنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: And no one misguided us except the criminals.

verses.text: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَـٰفِعِينَ
verses.translation: So now we have no intercessors

verses.text: وَلَا صَدِيقٍ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: And not a devoted friend.

verses.text: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers..."

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The people of Noah denied the messengers

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear ALLAH?

verses.text: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me."

verses.text: ۞ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لَكَ وَٱتَّبَعَكَ ٱلْأَرْذَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"

verses.text: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?

verses.text: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And I am not one to drive away the believers.

verses.text: إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: I am only a clear warner."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى كَذَّبُونِ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.

verses.text: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."

verses.text: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا بَعْدُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: ʿAad denied the messengers

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Hūd said to them, "Will you not fear ALLAH?

verses.text: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: أَتَبْنُونَ بِكُلِّ رِيعٍ ءَايَةً تَعْبَثُونَ
verses.translation: Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,

verses.text: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَانِعَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَخْلُدُونَ
verses.translation: And take for yourselves constructions [i.e., palaces and fortresses] that you might abide eternally?

verses.text: وَإِذَا بَطَشْتُم بَطَشْتُمْ جَبَّارِينَ
verses.translation: And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me.

verses.text: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,

verses.text: أَمَدَّكُم بِأَنْعَـٰمٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.translation: Provided you with grazing livestock and children

verses.text: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: And gardens and springs.

verses.text: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.

verses.text: إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا خُلُقُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This is not but the custom of the former peoples,

verses.text: وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: And we are not to be punished."

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Thamūd denied the messengers

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَـٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Ṣāliḥ said to them, "Will you not fear ALLAH?

verses.text: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: أَتُتْرَكُونَ فِى مَا هَـٰهُنَآ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.translation: Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],

verses.text: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Within gardens and springs

verses.text: وَزُرُوعٍ وَنَخْلٍ طَلْعُهَا هَضِيمٌ
verses.translation: And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?

verses.text: وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا فَـٰرِهِينَ
verses.translation: And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me.

verses.text: وَلَا تُطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.

verses.text: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."

verses.text: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.

verses.text: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."

verses.text: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.translation: But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.

verses.text: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The people of Lot denied the messengers

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear ALLAH?

verses.text: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلذُّكْرَانَ مِنَ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Do you approach males among the worlds

verses.text: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
verses.translation: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."

verses.text: قَالَ إِنِّى لِعَمَلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْقَالِينَ
verses.translation: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].

verses.text: رَبِّ نَجِّنِى وَأَهْلِى مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."

verses.text: فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: So We saved him and his family, all,

verses.text: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِى ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
verses.translation: Except an old woman among those who remained behind.

verses.text: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We destroyed the others.

verses.text: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The companions of the thicket [i.e., the people of Madyan] denied the messengers

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When Shuʿayb said to them, "Will you not fear ALLAH?

verses.text: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

verses.text: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear ALLAH and obey me.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: ۞ أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
verses.translation: Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.

verses.text: وَزِنُوا۟ بِٱلْقِسْطَاسِ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمِ
verses.translation: And weigh with an even [i.e., honest] balance.

verses.text: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.

verses.text: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And fear He who created you and the former creation."

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.translation: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.

verses.text: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَنزِيلُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: نَزَلَ بِهِ ٱلرُّوحُ ٱلْأَمِينُ
verses.translation: The Trustworthy Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] has brought it down

verses.text: عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: Upon your heart, [O Muḥammad] - that you may be of the warners -

verses.text: بِلِسَانٍ عَرَبِىٍّ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: In a clear Arabic language.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَفِى زُبُرِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.translation: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?

verses.text: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ بَعْضِ ٱلْأَعْجَمِينَ
verses.translation: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners

verses.text: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكْنَـٰهُ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Thus have We inserted it [i.e., disbelief] into the hearts of the criminals.

verses.text: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.

verses.text: فَيَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.

verses.text: فَيَقُولُوا۟ هَلْ نَحْنُ مُنظَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"

verses.text: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: So for Our punishment are they impatient?

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتَ إِن مَّتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years

verses.text: ثُمَّ جَآءَهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And then there came to them that which they were promised?

verses.text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
verses.translation: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners

verses.text: ذِكْرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.

verses.text: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
verses.translation: And the devils have not brought it [i.e., the revelation] down.

verses.text: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.translation: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّمْعِ لَمَعْزُولُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.

verses.text: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: So do not invoke with ALLAH another deity and [thus] be among the punished.

verses.text: وَأَنذِرْ عَشِيرَتَكَ ٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ
verses.translation: And warn, [O Muḥammad], your closest kindred.

verses.text: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And lower your wing [i.e., show kindness] to those who follow you of the believers.

verses.text: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."

verses.text: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى يَرَىٰكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: Who sees you when you arise

verses.text: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِى ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.translation: And your movement among those who prostrate.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

verses.text: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
verses.translation: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?

verses.text: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: They descend upon every sinful liar.

verses.text: يُلْقُونَ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ كَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.

verses.text: وَٱلشُّعَرَآءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ ٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
verses.translation: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
verses.translation: Do you not see that in every valley they roam

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: And that they say what they do not do? -

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember ALLAH often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.

verses.text: طسٓ ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Ṭā, Seen. These are the verses of the Qur’ān [i.e., recitation] and a clear Book

verses.text: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: As guidance and good tidings for the believers

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Who establish prayer and give zakāh, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly.

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ
verses.translation: Those are the ones for whom there will be the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they are the greatest losers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: And indeed, [O Muḥammad], you receive the Qur’ān from one Wise and Knowing.

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍ قَبَسٍ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Mention] when Moses said to his family, "Indeed, I have perceived a fire. I will bring you from there information or will bring you a burning torch that you may warm yourselves."

verses.text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِىَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: But when he came to it, he was called, "Blessed is whoever is at the fire and whoever is around it. And exalted is ALLAH, Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: O Moses, indeed it is I - ALLAH, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."

verses.text: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it were a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [ALLAH said], "O Moses, fear not. Indeed, in My presence the messengers do not fear.

verses.text: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًۢا بَعْدَ سُوٓءٍ فَإِنِّى غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Otherwise, he who wrongs, then substitutes good after evil - indeed, I am Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.text: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ۖ فِى تِسْعِ ءَايَـٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And put your hand into the opening of your garment [at the breast]; it will come out white without disease. [These are] among the nine signs [you will take] to Pharaoh and his people. Indeed, they have been a people defiantly disobedient."

verses.text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: But when there came to them Our visible signs, they said, "This is obvious magic."

verses.text: وَجَحَدُوا۟ بِهَا وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًا وَعُلُوًّا ۚ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: And they rejected them, while their [inner] selves were convinced thereof, out of injustice and haughtiness. So see how was the end of the corrupters.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ عِلْمًا ۖ وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And We had certainly given to David and Solomon knowledge, and they said, "Praise [is due] to ALLAH, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."

verses.text: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ دَاوُۥدَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: And Solomon inherited David. He said, "O people, we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given from all things. Indeed, this is evident bounty."

verses.text: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
verses.translation: And gathered for Solomon were his soldiers of the jinn and men and birds, and they were [marching] in rows

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمْلُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مَسَـٰكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Until, when they came upon the valley of the ants, an ant said, "O ants, enter your dwellings that you not be crushed by Solomon and his soldiers while they perceive not."

verses.text: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَـٰلِحًا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: So [Solomon] smiled, amused at her speech, and said, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants."

verses.text: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ
verses.translation: And he took attendance of the birds and said, "Why do I not see the hoopoe - or is he among the absent?

verses.text: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّى بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: I will surely punish him with a severe punishment or slaughter him unless he brings me clear authorization."

verses.text: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍۭ بِنَبَإٍ يَقِينٍ
verses.translation: But he [i.e., the hoopoe] stayed not long and said, "I have encompassed [in knowledge] that which you have not encompassed, and I have come to you from Sheba with certain news.

verses.text: إِنِّى وَجَدتُّ ٱمْرَأَةً تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, I found [there] a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, and she has a great throne.

verses.text: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of ALLAH, and Satan has made their deeds pleasing to them and averted them from [His] way, so they are not guided,

verses.text: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى يُخْرِجُ ٱلْخَبْءَ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: [And] so they do not prostrate to ALLAH, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare -

verses.text: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ ۩
verses.translation: ALLAH - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne."

verses.text: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.translation: [Solomon] said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars.

verses.text: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَـٰبِى هَـٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what [answer] they will return."

verses.text: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ إِنِّىٓ أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَـٰبٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: She said, "O eminent ones, indeed, to me has been delivered a noble letter.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it is [i.e., reads]: 'In the name of ALLAH, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,

verses.text: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission [as Muslims].'"

verses.text: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَفْتُونِى فِىٓ أَمْرِى مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ
verses.translation: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness [for] me."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command."

verses.text: قَالَتْ إِنَّ ٱلْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا۟ قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَآ أَذِلَّةً ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: She said, "Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled. And thus do they do.

verses.text: وَإِنِّى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍ فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: But indeed, I will send to them a gift and see with what [reply] the messengers will return."

verses.text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ
verses.translation: So when they came to Solomon, he said, "Do you provide me with wealth? But what ALLAH has given me is better than what He has given you. Rather, it is you who rejoice in your gift.

verses.text: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَآ أَذِلَّةً وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ
verses.translation: Return to them, for we will surely come to them with soldiers that they will be powerless to encounter, and we will surely expel them therefrom in humiliation, and they will be debased."

verses.text: قَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: [Solomon] said, "O assembly [of jinn], which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?"

verses.text: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ ۖ وَإِنِّى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: A powerful one from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you rise from your place, and indeed, I am for this [task] strong and trustworthy."

verses.text: قَالَ ٱلَّذِى عِندَهُۥ عِلْمٌ مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّى غَنِىٌّ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Said one who had knowledge from the Scripture, "I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you." And when [Solomon] saw it placed before him, he said, "This is from the favor of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever is ungrateful - then indeed, my Lord is Free of need and Generous."

verses.text: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا۟ لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِىٓ أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Disguise for her her throne; we will see whether she will be guided [to truth] or will be of those who is not guided."

verses.text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَـٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: So when she arrived, it was said [to her], "Is your throne like this?" She said, "[It is] as though it was it." [Solomon said], "And we were given knowledge before her, and we have been Muslims [in submission to ALLAH].

verses.text: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍ كَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: And that which she was worshipping other than ALLAH had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people."

verses.text: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةً وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌ مُّمَرَّدٌ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: She was told, "Enter the palace." But when she saw it, she thought it was a body of water and uncovered her shins [to wade through]. He said, "Indeed, it is a palace [whose floor is] made smooth with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to ALLAH, Lord of the worlds."

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: And We had certainly sent to Thamūd their brother Ṣāliḥ, [saying], "Worship ALLAH," and at once they were two parties conflicting.

verses.text: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "O my people, why are you impatient for evil before [i.e., instead of] good? Why do you not seek forgiveness of ALLAH that you may receive mercy?"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَـٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "We consider you a bad omen, you and those with you." He said, "Your omen [i.e., fate] is with ALLAH. Rather, you are a people being tested."

verses.text: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending [its affairs].

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Take a mutual oath by ALLAH that we will kill him by night, he and his family. Then we will say to his executor, 'We did not witness the destruction of his family, and indeed, we are truthful.'"

verses.text: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.

verses.text: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: Then look how was the outcome of their plan - that We destroyed them and their people, all.

verses.text: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةًۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: So those are their houses, desolate because of the wrong they had done. Indeed in that is a sign for people who know.

verses.text: وَأَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: And We saved those who believed and used to fear ALLAH.

verses.text: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality while you are seeing?

verses.text: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةً مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تَجْهَلُونَ
verses.translation: Do you indeed approach men with desire instead of women? Rather, you are a people behaving ignorantly."
