You can only warn those who fear their Lord unseen and have established prayer. And whoever purifies himself only purifies himself for [the benefit of] his soul. And to ALLAH is the [final] destination.

verses.text: وَمَا يَسْتَوِى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ وَٱلْبَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Not equal are the blind and the seeing,

verses.text: وَلَا ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتُ وَلَا ٱلنُّورُ
verses.translation: Nor are the darknesses and the light,

verses.text: وَلَا ٱلظِّلُّ وَلَا ٱلْحَرُورُ
verses.translation: Nor are the shade and the heat,

verses.text: وَمَا يَسْتَوِى ٱلْأَحْيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلْأَمْوَٰتُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسْمِعٍ مَّن فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, ALLAH causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves.

verses.text: إِنْ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: You, [O Muḥammad], are not but a warner.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۚ وَإِن مِّنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner.

verses.text: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَبِٱلزُّبُرِ وَبِٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُنِيرِ
verses.translation: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture.

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.translation: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦ ثَمَرَٰتٍ مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌۢ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُّخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَٰنُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ
verses.translation: Do you not see that ALLAH sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and [some] extremely black.

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْعُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
verses.translation: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear ALLAH, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, ALLAH is Exalted in Might and Forgiving.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَـٰبَ ٱللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً يَرْجُونَ تِجَـٰرَةً لَّن تَبُورَ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who recite the Book of ALLAH and establish prayer and spend [in His cause] out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, [can] expect a transaction [i.e., profit] that will never perish -

verses.text: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ مِنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: And that which We have revealed to you, [O Muḥammad], of the Book is the truth, confirming what was before it. Indeed ALLAH, of His servants, is Aware and Seeing.

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ وَمِنْهُم مُّقْتَصِدٌ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌۢ بِٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Then We caused to inherit the Book those We have chosen of Our servants; and among them is he who wrongs himself [i.e., sins], and among them is he who is moderate, and among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of ALLAH. That [inheritance] is what is the great bounty.

verses.text: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
verses.translation: [For them are] gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments therein will be silk.

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: And they will say, "Praise to ALLAH, who has removed from us [all] sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ ٱلْمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ
verses.translation: He who has settled us in the home of duration [i.e., Paradise] out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]."

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا۟ وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُم مِّنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى كُلَّ كَفُورٍ
verses.translation: And for those who disbelieve will be the fire of Hell. [Death] is not decreed for them so they may die, nor will its torment be lightened for them. Thus do We recompense every ungrateful one.

verses.text: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَآءَكُمُ ٱلنَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا۟ فَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
verses.translation: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you? So taste [the punishment], for there is not for the wrongdoers any helper.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَـٰلِمُ غَيْبِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: Indeed, ALLAH is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُۥ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: It is He who has made you successors upon the earth. And whoever disbelieves - upon him will be [the consequence of] his disbelief. And the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them in the sight of their Lord except in hatred; and the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them except in loss.

verses.text: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ شُرَكَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ أَمْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ كِتَـٰبًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِن يَعِدُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
verses.translation: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides ALLAH? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are [standing] on evidence therefrom? [No], rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion."

verses.text: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَآ إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, ALLAH holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving.

verses.text: وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ لَئِن جَآءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى ٱلْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَّا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
verses.translation: And they swore by ALLAH their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion

verses.text: ٱسْتِكْبَارًا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ ٱلسَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ ٱلْمَكْرُ ٱلسَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِۦ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
verses.translation: [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way [i.e., fate] of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way [i.e., established method] of ALLAH any change, and you will never find in the way of ALLAH any alteration.

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُۥ مِن شَىْءٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But ALLAH is not to be caused failure [i.e., prevented] by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent.

verses.text: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِن دَآبَّةٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ بَصِيرًۢا
verses.translation: And if ALLAH were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon it [i.e., the earth] any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed ALLAH has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.

verses.text: يسٓ
verses.translation: Yā, Seen.

verses.text: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: By the wise Qur’ān,

verses.text: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed you, [O Muḥammad], are from among the messengers,

verses.text: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: On a straight path.

verses.text: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

verses.text: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ
verses.translation: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.

verses.text: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Already the word [i.e., decree] has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.

verses.text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.

verses.text: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.

verses.text: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -

verses.text: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened [them] with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Your omen [i.e., fate] is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."

verses.text: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.

verses.text: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.

verses.text: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?

verses.text: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.translation: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?

verses.text: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.

verses.text: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
verses.translation: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

verses.text: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

verses.text: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."

verses.text: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.

verses.text: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ
verses.translation: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.

verses.text: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.translation: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?

verses.text: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.

verses.text: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
verses.translation: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -

verses.text: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?

verses.text: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.

verses.text: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it the [light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.

verses.text: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
verses.translation: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

verses.text: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
verses.translation: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.

verses.text: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.translation: It is not allowable [i.e., possible] for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.

verses.text: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.

verses.text: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.translation: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.

verses.text: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.translation: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

verses.text: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy..."

verses.text: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which ALLAH has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if ALLAH had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."

verses.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

verses.text: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.translation: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.

verses.text: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.

verses.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.translation: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."

verses.text: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.

verses.text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: So today [i.e., the Day of Judgement] no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.

verses.text: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -

verses.text: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
verses.translation: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.

verses.text: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.translation: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.

verses.text: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.

verses.text: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -

verses.text: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?

verses.text: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.

verses.text: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."

verses.text: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.

verses.text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?

verses.text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.

verses.text: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We did not give him [i.e., Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)] knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur’ān

verses.text: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word [i.e., decree] against the disbelievers.

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?

verses.text: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.

verses.text: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?

verses.text: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: But they have taken besides ALLAH [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.

verses.text: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.

verses.text: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?

verses.text: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"

verses.text: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.translation: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.

verses.text: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.

verses.text: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.

verses.text: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.

verses.text: وَٱلصَّـٰٓفَّـٰتِ صَفًّا
verses.translation: By those [angels] lined up in rows

verses.text: فَٱلزَّٰجِرَٰتِ زَجْرًا
verses.translation: And those who drive [the clouds]

verses.text: فَٱلتَّـٰلِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And those who recite the message,

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَـٰهَكُمْ لَوَٰحِدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, your God is One,

verses.text: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.

verses.text: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars

verses.text: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ مَّارِدٍ
verses.translation: And as protection against every rebellious devil

verses.text: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.translation: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,

verses.text: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ
verses.translation: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.translation: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].

verses.text: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ
verses.translation: Then inquire of them, [O Muḥammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created them [i.e., men] from sticky clay.

verses.text: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
verses.translation: But you wonder, while they mock,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And when they are reminded, they remember not.

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
verses.translation: And when they see a sign, they ridicule.

verses.text: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

verses.text: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: And our forefathers [as well]?"

verses.text: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

verses.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."

verses.text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."

verses.text: ۞ ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

verses.text: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Other than ALLAH, and guide them to the path of Hellfire

verses.text: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْـُٔولُونَ
verses.translation: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"

verses.text: بَلْ هُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: But they, that Day, are in surrender.

verses.text: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they will approach one another asking [i.e., blaming] each other.

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: They [i.e., the oppressors] will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

verses.text: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَـٰغِينَ
verses.translation: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.

verses.text: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
verses.translation: So the word [i.e., decree] of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].

verses.text: فَأَغْوَيْنَـٰكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَـٰوِينَ
verses.translation: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."

verses.text: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
verses.translation: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but ALLAH," were arrogant

verses.text: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
verses.translation: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"

verses.text: بَلْ جَآءَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Rather, he [i.e., the Prophet (ﷺ)] has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

verses.text: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَآئِقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَلِيمِ
verses.translation: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

verses.text: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: But not the chosen servants of ALLAH.

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: Those will have a provision determined -

verses.text: فَوَٰكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: Fruits; and they will be honored

verses.text: فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: In gardens of pleasure

verses.text: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.translation: On thrones facing one another.

verses.text: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍۭ
verses.translation: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

verses.text: بَيْضَآءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ
verses.translation: White and delicious to the drinkers;

verses.text: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.translation: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

verses.text: وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ عِينٌ
verses.translation: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

verses.text: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ
verses.translation: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth].

verses.text: يَقُولُ أَءِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ
verses.translation: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.translation: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"

verses.text: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
verses.translation: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"

verses.text: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

verses.text: قَالَ تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
verses.translation: He will say, "By ALLAH, you almost ruined me.

verses.text: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.translation: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

verses.text: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
verses.translation: Then, are we not to die

verses.text: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is the great attainment.

verses.text: لِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ ٱلْعَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.translation: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

verses.text: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: Is that [i.e., Paradise] a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqūm?

verses.text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

verses.text: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

verses.text: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
verses.translation: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

verses.text: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ ضَآلِّينَ
verses.translation: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

verses.text: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
verses.translation: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We had already sent among them warners.

verses.text: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: But not the chosen servants of ALLAH.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ
verses.translation: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.

verses.text: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥ هُمُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We drowned the others [i.e., disbelievers].

verses.text: ۞ وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ لَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.translation: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

verses.text: إِذْ جَآءَ رَبَّهُۥ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?

verses.text: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَةً دُونَ ٱللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than ALLAH you desire?

verses.text: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"

verses.text: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِى ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And he cast a look at the stars.

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنِّى سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.translation: So they turned away from him, departing.

verses.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?".

verses.text: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًۢا بِٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
verses.translation: Then they [i.e., the people] came toward him, hastening.

verses.text: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: While ALLAH created you and that which you do?"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: They said, "Construct for him a structure [i.e., furnace] and throw him into the burning fire."

verses.text: فَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ
verses.translation: And they intended for him a plan [i.e., harm], but We made them the most debased.

verses.text: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.

verses.text: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."

verses.text: فَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ حَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

verses.text: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.translation: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if ALLAH wills, of the steadfast."

verses.text: فَلَمَّآ أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلْجَبِينِ
verses.translation: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,

verses.text: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ أَن يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ
verses.translation: We called to him, "O Abraham,

verses.text: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْبَلَـٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: Indeed, this was the clear trial.

verses.text: وَفَدَيْنَـٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.translation: "Peace upon Abraham."

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

verses.text: وَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِإِسْحَـٰقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.

verses.text: وَبَـٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself [i.e., sinner].

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ
verses.translation: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

verses.text: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

verses.text: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُمْ فَكَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
verses.translation: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

verses.text: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ
verses.translation: And We gave them the explicit Scripture [i.e., the Torah],

verses.text: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And We guided them on the straight path.

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ
verses.translation: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear ALLAH?

verses.text: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
verses.translation: Do you call upon Baʿl and leave the best of creators -

verses.text: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: ALLAH, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the chosen servants of ALLAH.

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
verses.translation: "Peace upon Elias."

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

verses.text: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,

verses.text: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِى ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
verses.translation: Except an old woman [i.e., his wife] among those who remained [with the evildoers].

verses.text: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We destroyed the others.

verses.text: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

verses.text: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

verses.text: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.

verses.text: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.

verses.text: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُدْحَضِينَ
verses.translation: And he drew lots and was among the losers.

verses.text: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.

verses.text: فَلَوْلَآ أَنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَبِّحِينَ
verses.translation: And had he not been of those who exalt ALLAH,

verses.text: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.

verses.text: ۞ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.

verses.text: وَأَنۢبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ
verses.translation: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

verses.text: وَأَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.translation: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.

verses.text: فَـَٔامَنُوا۟ فَمَتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.

verses.text: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: So inquire of them, [O Muḥammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?

verses.text: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَـٰثًا وَهُمْ شَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"

verses.text: أَلَآ إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,

verses.text: وَلَدَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.translation: "ALLAH has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.

verses.text: أَصْطَفَى ٱلْبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلْبَنِينَ
verses.translation: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?

verses.text: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Then will you not be reminded?

verses.text: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Or do you have a clear authority?

verses.text: فَأْتُوا۟ بِكِتَـٰبِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.

verses.text: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they have made [i.e., claimed] between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought [to punishment].

verses.text: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Exalted is ALLAH above what they describe,

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the chosen servants of ALLAH [who do not share in that sin].

verses.text: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,

verses.text: مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَـٰتِنِينَ
verses.translation: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

verses.text: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلصَّآفُّونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْمُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, we are those who exalt ALLAH."

verses.text: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, they [i.e., the disbelievers] used to say,

verses.text: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,

verses.text: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: We would have been the chosen servants of ALLAH."

verses.text: فَكَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And Our word [i.e., decree] has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ
verses.translation: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory

verses.text: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.translation: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers [i.e., the believers] will be those who overcome.

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: So, [O Muḥammad], leave them for a time.

verses.text: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.

verses.text: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

verses.text: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.

verses.text: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And leave them for a time.

verses.text: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And see, for they are going to see.

verses.text: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.

verses.text: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَى ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And peace upon the messengers.

verses.text: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And praise to ALLAH, Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
verses.translation: Ṣād. By the Qur’ān containing reminder...

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.translation: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.

verses.text: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.translation: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.

verses.text: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.translation: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner [i.e., Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)] from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.

verses.text: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.translation: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."

verses.text: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.translation: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.

verses.text: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ
verses.translation: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.

verses.text: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
verses.translation: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
verses.translation: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.

verses.text: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
verses.translation: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] ʿAad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,

verses.text: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
verses.translation: And [the tribe of] Thamūd and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket [i.e., people of Madyan]. Those are the companies.

verses.text: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.translation: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.

verses.text: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
verses.translation: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account."

verses.text: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to ALLAH].

verses.text: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [ALLAH] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise.

verses.text: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].

verses.text: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.

verses.text: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
verses.translation: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber -

verses.text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
verses.translation: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech."

verses.text: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.translation: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe [in addition] to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to ALLAH].

verses.text: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

verses.text: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: [We said], "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of ALLAH." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of ALLAH will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account.

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire.

verses.text: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
verses.translation: Or should We treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear ALLAH like the wicked?

verses.text: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muḥammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.

verses.text: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to ALLAH].

verses.text: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
verses.translation: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses.

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
verses.translation: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until it [i.e., the sun] disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."

verses.text: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.translation: [He said], "Return them to me," and set about striking [their] legs and necks.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.translation: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned.

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."

verses.text: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.translation: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed,

verses.text: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.translation: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver.

verses.text: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
verses.translation: And others bound together in irons.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: [We said], "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account."

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.translation: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."

verses.text: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.translation: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; this is a [spring for a] cool bath and drink."

verses.text: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.

verses.text: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to ALLAH].

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
verses.translation: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return -

verses.text: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
verses.translation: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.translation: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.

verses.text: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.translation: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.translation: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -

verses.text: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
verses.translation: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
verses.translation: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.

verses.text: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
verses.translation: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
verses.translation: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
verses.translation: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?

verses.text: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ
verses.translation: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"

verses.text: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: Indeed, that is truth [i.e., reality] - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.

verses.text: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Say, [O Muḥammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except ALLAH, the One, the Prevailing,

verses.text: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."

verses.text: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say, "It is great news

verses.text: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: From which you turn away.

verses.text: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].

verses.text: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.

verses.text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
verses.translation: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."

verses.text: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,

verses.text: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.

verses.text: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
verses.translation: [ALLAH] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty?"

verses.text: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ
verses.translation: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."

verses.text: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.translation: [ALLAH] said, "Then get out of it [i.e., Paradise], for indeed, you are expelled.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

verses.text: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: [ALLAH] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

verses.text: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
verses.translation: Until the Day of the time well-known."

verses.text: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: [Iblees] said, "By Your might, I will surely mislead them all.

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."

verses.text: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.translation: [ALLAH] said, "The truth [is My oath], and the truth I say -

verses.text: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together."

verses.text: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Say, [O Muḥammad], "I do not ask you for it [i.e., the Qur’ān] any payment, and I am not of the pretentious.

verses.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is but a reminder to the worlds.

verses.text: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
verses.translation: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time."

verses.text: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: The revelation of the Book [i.e., the Qur’ān] is from ALLAH, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muḥammad], in truth. So worship ALLAH, [being] sincere to Him in religion.

verses.text: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
verses.translation: Unquestionably, for ALLAH is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to ALLAH in position." Indeed, ALLAH will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, ALLAH does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever.

verses.text: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: If ALLAH had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is ALLAH, the One, the Prevailing.

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
verses.translation: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.

verses.text: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍ ثَلَـٰثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
verses.translation: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is ALLAH, your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted?

verses.text: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: If you disbelieve - indeed, ALLAH is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves [i.e., likes] it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

verses.text: ۞ وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to ALLAH equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."

verses.text: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَـٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَآئِمًا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.

verses.text: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of ALLAH is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account [i.e., limit]."

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
verses.translation: Say, [O Muḥammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship ALLAH, [being] sincere to Him in religion.

verses.text: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."

verses.text: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
verses.translation: Say, "ALLAH [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,

verses.text: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."

verses.text: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَـٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.translation: They will have canopies [i.e., layers] of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that ALLAH threatens [i.e., warns] His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
verses.translation: But those who have avoided ṭāghūt, lest they worship it, and turned back to ALLAH - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones ALLAH has guided, and those are people of understanding.

verses.text: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment [to be guided]? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire?

verses.text: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَّبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
verses.translation: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] the promise of ALLAH. ALLAH does not fail in [His] promise.

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَـٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَـٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.translation: Do you not see that ALLAH sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs [and rivers] in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them [scattered] debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding.

verses.text: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْقَـٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: So is one whose breast ALLAH has expanded to [accept] Islām and he is upon [i.e., guided by] a light from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects it]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of ALLAH. Those are in manifest error.

verses.text: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَـٰبًا مُّتَشَـٰبِهًا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
verses.translation: ALLAH has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance [i.e., mention] of ALLAH.
