verses.text: إِذْ جَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًا
verses.translation: When those who disbelieved had put into their hearts chauvinism - the chauvinism of the time of ignorance. But ALLAH sent down His tranquility upon His Messenger and upon the believers and imposed upon them the word of righteousness, and they were more deserving of it and worthy of it. And ever is ALLAH, of all things, Knowing.

verses.text: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ ٱلرُّءْيَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا۟ فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Certainly has ALLAH showed to His Messenger the vision [i.e., dream] in truth. You will surely enter al-Masjid al-Ḥarām, if ALLAH wills, in safety, with your heads shaved and [hair] shortened, not fearing [anyone]. He knew what you did not know and has arranged before that a conquest near [at hand].

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
verses.translation: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion. And sufficient is ALLAH as Witness.

verses.text: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥٓ أَشِدَّآءُ عَلَى ٱلْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَآءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَىٰهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِى وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلسُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْـَٔهُۥ فَـَٔازَرَهُۥ فَٱسْتَغْلَظَ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِۦ يُعْجِبُ ٱلزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًۢا
verses.translation: Muḥammad is the Messenger of ALLAH; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers, merciful among themselves. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking bounty from ALLAH and [His] pleasure. Their sign is in their faces from the effect of prostration [i.e., prayer]. That is their description in the Torah. And their description in the Gospel is as a plant which produces its offshoots and strengthens them so they grow firm and stand upon their stalks, delighting the sowers - so that He [i.e., ALLAH] may enrage by them the disbelievers. ALLAH has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds among them forgiveness and a great reward.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, do not put [yourselves] before ALLAH and His Messenger but fear ALLAH. Indeed, ALLAH is Hearing and Knowing.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَرْفَعُوٓا۟ أَصْوَٰتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا۟ لَهُۥ بِٱلْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَـٰلُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet or be loud to him in speech like the loudness of some of you to others, lest your deeds become worthless while you perceive not.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَٰتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱمْتَحَنَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who lower their voices before the Messenger of ALLAH - they are the ones whose hearts ALLAH has tested for righteousness. For them is forgiveness and great reward.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلْحُجُرَٰتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muḥammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.

verses.text: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: And if they had been patient until you [could] come out to them, it would have been better for them. But ALLAH is Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن جَآءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌۢ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓا۟ أَن تُصِيبُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بِجَهَـٰلَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, if there comes to you a disobedient one with information, investigate, lest you harm a people out of ignorance and become, over what you have done, regretful.

verses.text: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِى كَثِيرٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْكُفْرَ وَٱلْفُسُوقَ وَٱلْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّٰشِدُونَ
verses.translation: And know that among you is the Messenger of ALLAH. If he were to obey you in much of the matter, you would be in difficulty, but ALLAH has endeared to you the faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief, defiance and disobedience. Those are the [rightly] guided.

verses.text: فَضْلًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: [It is] as bounty from ALLAH and favor. And ALLAH is Knowing and Wise.

verses.text: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ٱقْتَتَلُوا۟ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتْ إِحْدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّتِى تَبْغِى حَتَّىٰ تَفِىٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَآءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا بِٱلْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُقْسِطِينَ
verses.translation: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two. But if one of them oppresses the other, then fight against the one that oppresses until it returns to the ordinance of ALLAH. And if it returns, then make settlement between them in justice and act justly. Indeed, ALLAH loves those who act justly.

verses.text: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear ALLAH that you may receive mercy.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَآءٌ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا۟ بِٱلْأَلْقَـٰبِ ۖ بِئْسَ ٱلِٱسْمُ ٱلْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, let not a people ridicule [another] people; perhaps they may be better than them; nor let women ridicule [other] women; perhaps they may be better than them. And do not insult one another and do not call each other by [offensive] nicknames. Wretched is the name [i.e., mention] of disobedience after [one's] faith. And whoever does not repent - then it is those who are the wrongdoers.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا۟ وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear ALLAH; indeed, ALLAH is Accepting of Repentance and Merciful.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَـٰكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتْقَىٰكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of ALLAH is the most righteous of you. Indeed, ALLAH is Knowing and Aware.

verses.text: ۞ قَالَتِ ٱلْأَعْرَابُ ءَامَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَلَـٰكِن قُولُوٓا۟ أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنُ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَـٰلِكُمْ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey ALLAH and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, ALLAH is Forgiving and Merciful."

verses.text: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
verses.translation: The believers are only the ones who have believed in ALLAH and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of ALLAH. It is those who are the truthful.

verses.text: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say, "Would you acquaint ALLAH with your religion while ALLAH knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and ALLAH is Knowing of all things?"

verses.text: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا۟ ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا۟ عَلَىَّ إِسْلَـٰمَكُم ۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَىٰكُمْ لِلْإِيمَـٰنِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islām. Say, "Do not consider your Islām a favor to me. Rather, ALLAH has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, ALLAH knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And ALLAH is Seeing of what you do.

verses.text: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: Qāf. By the honored Qur’ān...

verses.text: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant [i.e., unlikely] return."

verses.text: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
verses.translation: We know what the earth diminishes [i.e., consumes] of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

verses.text: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

verses.text: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

verses.text: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to ALLAH].

verses.text: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

verses.text: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

verses.text: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the emergence [i.e., resurrection].

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamūd

verses.text: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: And ʿAad and Pharaoh and the brothers [i.e., people] of Lot

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubbaʿ. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

verses.text: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein.

verses.text: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When the two receivers [i.e., recording angels] receive, seated on the right and on the left.

verses.text: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: He [i.e., man] utters no word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

verses.text: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

verses.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

verses.text: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

verses.text: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

verses.text: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

verses.text: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: [ALLAH will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

verses.text: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: Who made [as equal] with ALLAH another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

verses.text: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

verses.text: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: [ALLAH] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the threat [i.e., warning].

verses.text: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: The word [i.e., decree] will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

verses.text: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

verses.text: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

verses.text: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to ALLAH] and keeper [of His covenant].

verses.text: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Who feared the Most Merciful in the unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

verses.text: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

verses.text: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

verses.text: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: So be patient, [O Muḥammad], over what they say and exalt [ALLAH] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.translation: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration [i.e., prayer].

verses.text: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

verses.text: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur’ān whoever fears My threat.

verses.text: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: By the [winds] scattering [dust], dispersing [it]

verses.text: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: And the [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

verses.text: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: And the ships sailing with ease

verses.text: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And the [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.translation: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By the heaven containing pathways,

verses.text: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

verses.text: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: Deluded away from it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is he who is deluded.

verses.text: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
verses.translation: Destroyed are the misinformers

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

verses.text: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire.

verses.text: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

verses.text: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

verses.text: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They used to sleep but little of the night,

verses.text: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

verses.text: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

verses.text: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

verses.text: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

verses.text: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

verses.text: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

verses.text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace; [you are] a people unknown."

verses.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf.

verses.text: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

verses.text: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

verses.text: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

verses.text: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: To send down upon them stones of clay,

verses.text: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

verses.text: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So We brought out whoever was in them [i.e., the cities] of the believers.

verses.text: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.text: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: But he turned away with his supporters and said, "A magician or a madman."

verses.text: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

verses.text: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And in ʿAad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

verses.text: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

verses.text: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Thamūd, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

verses.text: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

verses.text: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

verses.text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

verses.text: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of all things We created two mates [i.e., counterparts]; perhaps you will remember.

verses.text: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: So flee to ALLAH. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

verses.text: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And do not make [as equal] with ALLAH another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

verses.text: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: So leave them, [O Muḥammad], for you are not to be blamed.

verses.text: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

verses.text: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is ALLAH who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

verses.text: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their companions [i.e., predecessors], so let them not impatiently urge Me.

verses.text: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

verses.text: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the mount

verses.text: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.translation: And [by] a Book inscribed

verses.text: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.translation: In parchment spread open

verses.text: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the frequented House

verses.text: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.translation: And [by] the ceiling [i.e., heaven] raised high

verses.text: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the sea set on fire,

verses.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

verses.text: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.translation: Of it there is no preventer.

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
verses.translation: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

verses.text: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.translation: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

verses.text: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

verses.text: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

verses.text: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

verses.text: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

verses.text: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

verses.text: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

verses.text: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.translation: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

verses.text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

verses.text: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing ALLAH].

verses.text: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.translation: So ALLAH conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

verses.text: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

verses.text: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: So remind, [O Muḥammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

verses.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time"?

verses.text: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

verses.text: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

verses.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

verses.text: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

verses.text: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.translation: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

verses.text: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority [i.e., proof].

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

verses.text: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you, [O Muḥammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

verses.text: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they a deity other than ALLAH? Exalted is ALLAH above whatever they associate with Him.

verses.text: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.translation: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

verses.text: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

verses.text: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

verses.text: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: And be patient, [O Muḥammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes [i.e., sight]. And exalt [ALLAH] with praise of your Lord when you arise

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.

verses.text: وَٱلنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
verses.translation: By the star when it descends,

verses.text: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
verses.translation: Your companion [i.e., Muḥammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,

verses.text: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

verses.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْىٌ يُوحَىٰ
verses.translation: It is not but a revelation revealed,

verses.text: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلْقُوَىٰ
verses.translation: Taught to him by one intense in strength [i.e., Gabriel] -

verses.text: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ
verses.translation: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

verses.text: وَهُوَ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.

verses.text: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he approached and descended

verses.text: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

verses.text: فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ مَآ أَوْحَىٰ
verses.translation: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed [i.e., conveyed].

verses.text: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰٓ
verses.translation: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

verses.text: أَفَتُمَـٰرُونَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And he certainly saw him in another descent

verses.text: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

verses.text: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Near it is the Garden of Refuge [i.e., Paradise] -

verses.text: إِذْ يَغْشَى ٱلسِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

verses.text: مَا زَاغَ ٱلْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: The sight [of the Prophet (ﷺ)] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].

verses.text: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱللَّـٰتَ وَٱلْعُزَّىٰ
verses.translation: So have you considered al-Lāt and al-ʿUzzā?

verses.text: وَمَنَوٰةَ ٱلثَّالِثَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And Manāt, the third - the other one?

verses.text: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

verses.text: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰٓ
verses.translation: That, then, is an unjust division.

verses.text: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى ٱلْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which ALLAH has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

verses.text: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
verses.translation: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

verses.text: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Rather, to ALLAH belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

verses.text: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغْنِى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْضَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after ALLAH has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

verses.text: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًٔا
verses.translation: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.

verses.text: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.

verses.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ بِٱلْحُسْنَى
verses.translation: And to ALLAH belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who turned away

verses.text: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

verses.text: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?

verses.text: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

verses.text: وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلَّذِى وَفَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -

verses.text: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

verses.text: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

verses.text: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُۥ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that his effort is going to be seen -

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُجْزَىٰهُ ٱلْجَزَآءَ ٱلْأَوْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense -

verses.text: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: And that to your Lord is the finality

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
verses.translation: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ خَلَقَ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

verses.text: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

verses.text: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the other [i.e., next] creation.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلشِّعْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And that He destroyed the first [people of] ʿAad.

verses.text: وَثَمُودَا۟ فَمَآ أَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: And Thamūd - and He did not spare [them] -

verses.text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

verses.text: وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
verses.translation: And the overturned towns He hurled down.

verses.text: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.translation: And covered them by that which He covered.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.translation: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

verses.text: هَـٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ ٱلنُّذُرِ ٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
verses.translation: This [Prophet (ﷺ)] is a warner from [i.e., like] the former warners.

verses.text: أَزِفَتِ ٱلْـَٔازِفَةُ
verses.translation: The Approaching Day has approached.

verses.text: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.translation: Of it, [from those] besides ALLAH, there is no remover.

verses.text: أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
verses.translation: Then at this statement do you wonder?

verses.text: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
verses.translation: And you laugh and do not weep

verses.text: وَأَنتُمْ سَـٰمِدُونَ
verses.translation: While you are proudly sporting?

verses.text: فَٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ ۩
verses.translation: So prostrate to ALLAH and worship [Him].

verses.text: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].

verses.text: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.translation: And if they see a sign [i.e., miracle], they turn away and say, "Passing magic."

verses.text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence.

verses.text: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: So leave them, [O Muḥammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,

verses.text: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

verses.text: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.translation: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

verses.text: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
verses.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

verses.text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ
verses.translation: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

verses.text: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.translation: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

verses.text: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

verses.text: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.translation: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

verses.text: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

verses.text: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: ʿAad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

verses.text: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.translation: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Thamūd denied the warning.

verses.text: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

verses.text: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.translation: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

verses.text: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ
verses.translation: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

verses.text: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ
verses.translation: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.

verses.text: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.translation: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

verses.text: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them one shriek [i.e., blast from the sky], and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lot denied the warning.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn.

verses.text: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: As favor from Us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.

verses.text: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: So taste My punishment and warning.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur’ān easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.

verses.text: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.

verses.text: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scriptures?

verses.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?

verses.text: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness..

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."

verses.text: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ
verses.translation: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?

verses.text: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: And everything they did is in written records.

verses.text: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

verses.text: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ
verses.translation: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.

verses.text: ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ
verses.translation: The Most Merciful

verses.text: عَلَّمَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ
verses.translation: Taught the Qur’ān,

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ
verses.translation: Created man,

verses.text: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلْبَيَانَ
verses.translation: [And] taught him eloquence.

verses.text: ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
verses.translation: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّجْمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
verses.translation: And the stars and trees prostrate.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

verses.text: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْمِيزَانِ
verses.translation: That you not transgress within the balance.

verses.text: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
verses.translation: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.

verses.text: فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَٱلنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ ٱلْأَكْمَامِ
verses.translation: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]

verses.text: وَٱلْحَبُّ ذُو ٱلْعَصْفِ وَٱلرَّيْحَانُ
verses.translation: And grain having husks and scented plants.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ كَٱلْفَخَّارِ
verses.translation: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.

verses.text: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.translation: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
verses.translation: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
verses.translation: He released the two seas, meeting [one another];

verses.text: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
verses.translation: Between them is a barrier so neither of them transgresses.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا ٱللُّؤْلُؤُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ
verses.translation: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ
verses.translation: Everyone upon it [i.e., the earth] will perish,

verses.text: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ
verses.translation: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is in [i.e., bringing about] a matter.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ ٱلثَّقَلَانِ
verses.translation: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ
verses.translation: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from ALLAH].

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.translation: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَٱلدِّهَانِ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.translation: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ
verses.translation: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.

verses.text: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ ءَانٍ
verses.translation: They will circulate between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.text: ذَوَاتَآ أَفْنَانٍ
verses.translation: Having [spreading] branches.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
verses.translation: In both of them are two springs, flowing.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ زَوْجَانِ
verses.translation: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.translation: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: فِيهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.translation: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinnī -

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُنَّ ٱلْيَاقُوتُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: As if they were rubies and coral.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: هَلْ جَزَآءُ ٱلْإِحْسَـٰنِ إِلَّا ٱلْإِحْسَـٰنُ
verses.translation: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.text: مُدْهَآمَّتَانِ
verses.translation: Dark green [in color].

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
verses.translation: In both of them are two springs, spouting.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَنَخْلٌ وَرُمَّانٌ
verses.translation: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَٰتٌ حِسَانٌ
verses.translation: In them are good and beautiful women -

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.text: حُورٌ مَّقْصُورَٰتٌ فِى ٱلْخِيَامِ
verses.translation: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.text: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.translation: Untouched before them by man or jinnī -

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.translation: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.text: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

verses.text: إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: When the Occurrence occurs,

verses.text: لَيْسَ لِوَقْعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
verses.translation: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.

verses.text: خَافِضَةٌ رَّافِعَةٌ
verses.translation: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].

verses.text: إِذَا رُجَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ رَجًّا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with convulsion

verses.text: وَبُسَّتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ بَسًّا
verses.translation: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling

verses.text: فَكَانَتْ هَبَآءً مُّنۢبَثًّا
verses.translation: And become dust dispersing,

verses.text: وَكُنتُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا ثَلَـٰثَةً
verses.translation: And you become [of] three kinds:

verses.text: فَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
verses.translation: And the companions of the left - what are companions of the left?

verses.text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ
verses.translation: And the forerunners, the forerunners -

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: Those are the ones brought near [to ALLAH]

verses.text: فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: In the Gardens of Pleasure,

verses.text: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: A [large] company of the former peoples

verses.text: وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And a few of the later peoples,

verses.text: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّوْضُونَةٍ
verses.translation: On thrones woven [with ornament],

verses.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.translation: Reclining on them, facing each other.

verses.text: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ
verses.translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal.

verses.text: بِأَكْوَابٍ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -

verses.text: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُنزِفُونَ
verses.translation: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -

verses.text: وَفَـٰكِهَةٍ مِّمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And fruit of what they select

verses.text: وَلَحْمِ طَيْرٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.

verses.text: وَحُورٌ عِينٌ
verses.translation: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,

verses.text: كَأَمْثَـٰلِ ٱللُّؤْلُؤِ ٱلْمَكْنُونِ
verses.translation: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,

verses.text: جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: As reward for what they used to do.

verses.text: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.translation: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -

verses.text: إِلَّا قِيلًا سَلَـٰمًا سَلَـٰمًا
verses.translation: Only a saying [of] peace, peace.

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْيَمِينِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

verses.text: فِى سِدْرٍ مَّخْضُودٍ
verses.translation: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed.

verses.text: وَطَلْحٍ مَّنضُودٍ
verses.translation: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit].

verses.text: وَظِلٍّ مَّمْدُودٍ
verses.translation: And shade extended.

verses.text: وَمَآءٍ مَّسْكُوبٍ
verses.translation: And water poured out

verses.text: وَفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ
verses.translation: And fruit, abundant [and varied],

verses.text: لَّا مَقْطُوعَةٍ وَلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,

verses.text: وَفُرُشٍ مَّرْفُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: And [upon] beds raised high.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُنَّ إِنشَآءً
verses.translation: Indeed, We have produced them [i.e., the women of Paradise] in a [new] creation

verses.text: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُنَّ أَبْكَارًا
verses.translation: And made them virgins,

verses.text: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,

verses.text: لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: For the companions of the right [who are]

verses.text: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: A company of the former peoples

verses.text: وَثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And a company of the later peoples.

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ
verses.translation: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

verses.text: فِى سَمُومٍ وَحَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water

verses.text: وَظِلٍّ مِّن يَحْمُومٍ
verses.translation: And a shade of black smoke,

verses.text: لَّا بَارِدٍ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Neither cool nor beneficial.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتْرَفِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,

verses.text: وَكَانُوا۟ يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى ٱلْحِنثِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And they used to persist in the great violation,

verses.text: وَكَانُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

verses.text: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: And our forefathers [as well]?"

verses.text: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Say, [O Muḥammad], "Indeed, the former and later peoples

verses.text: لَمَجْمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَـٰتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,

verses.text: لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرٍ مِّن زَقُّومٍ
verses.translation: Will be eating from trees of zaqqūm

verses.text: فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: And filling with it your bellies

verses.text: فَشَـٰرِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: And drinking on top of it from scalding water.

verses.text: فَشَـٰرِبُونَ شُرْبَ ٱلْهِيمِ
verses.translation: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.

verses.text: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
verses.translation: We have created you, so why do you not believe?

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تُمْنُونَ
verses.translation: Have you seen that which you emit?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُۥٓ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?

verses.text: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

verses.text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَـٰلَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِى مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَحْرُثُونَ
verses.translation: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُۥٓ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلزَّٰرِعُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?

verses.text: لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ حُطَـٰمًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.translation: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,

verses.text: إِنَّا لَمُغْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;

verses.text: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.translation: Rather, we have been deprived."

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱلْمَآءَ ٱلَّذِى تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.translation: And have you seen the water that you drink?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?

verses.text: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِى تُورُونَ
verses.translation: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنشِـُٔونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?

verses.text: نَحْنُ جَعَلْنَـٰهَا تَذْكِرَةً وَمَتَـٰعًا لِّلْمُقْوِينَ
verses.translation: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,

verses.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

verses.text: ۞ فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِمَوَٰقِعِ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَقَسَمٌ لَّوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقُرْءَانٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is a noble Qur’ān.

verses.text: فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مَّكْنُونٍ
verses.translation: In a Register well-protected;.

verses.text: لَّا يَمَسُّهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْمُطَهَّرُونَ
verses.translation: None touch it except the purified [i.e., the angels].

verses.text: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: أَفَبِهَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ أَنتُم مُّدْهِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

verses.text: وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?

verses.text: فَلَوْلَآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلْحُلْقُومَ
verses.translation: Then why, when it [i.e., the soul at death] reaches the throat

verses.text: وَأَنتُمْ حِينَئِذٍ تَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: And you are at that time looking on -

verses.text: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We [i.e., Our angels] are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -

verses.text: فَلَوْلَآ إِن كُنتُمْ غَيْرَ مَدِينِينَ
verses.translation: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,

verses.text: تَرْجِعُونَهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?

verses.text: فَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: And if he [i.e., the deceased] was of those brought near [to ALLAH],

verses.text: فَرَوْحٌ وَرَيْحَانٌ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: And if he was of the companions of the right,

verses.text: فَسَلَـٰمٌ لَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,

verses.text: فَنُزُلٌ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

verses.text: وَتَصْلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: And burning in Hellfire.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ ٱلْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is the true certainty,

verses.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

verses.text: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts ALLAH, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

verses.text: لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلْأَوَّلُ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلْبَاطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And ALLAH, of what you do, is Seeing.

verses.text: لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
verses.translation: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to ALLAH are returned [all] matters.

verses.text: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

verses.text: ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسْتَخْلَفِينَ فِيهِ ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
