verses.text: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَآئِفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ
verses.translation: So there came upon it [i.e., the garden] an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.

verses.text: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَٱلصَّرِيمِ
verses.translation: And it became as though reaped.

verses.text: فَتَنَادَوْا۟ مُصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: And they called one another at morning,

verses.text: أَنِ ٱغْدُوا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰرِمِينَ
verses.translation: [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit."

verses.text: فَٱنطَلَقُوا۟ وَهُمْ يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ
verses.translation: So they set out, while lowering their voices,

verses.text: أَن لَّا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُم مِّسْكِينٌ
verses.translation: [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person."

verses.text: وَغَدَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْدٍ قَـٰدِرِينَ
verses.translation: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able.

verses.text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.translation: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost;

verses.text: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.translation: Rather, we have been deprived."

verses.text: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.translation: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [ALLAH]?'"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَلَـٰوَمُونَ
verses.translation: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَـٰغِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors.

verses.text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِّنْهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ
verses.translation: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous."

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.

verses.text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.

verses.text: أَفَنَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ كَٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals?

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge?

verses.text: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَـٰبٌ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn

verses.text: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.translation: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?

verses.text: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَـٰنٌ عَلَيْنَا بَـٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge?

verses.text: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ
verses.translation: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَن سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.translation: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but they [i.e., the disbelievers] will not be able,

verses.text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.

verses.text: فَذَرْنِى وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: So leave Me, [O Muḥammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies this statement [i.e., the Qur’ān]. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know.

verses.text: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ
verses.translation: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.

verses.text: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ
verses.translation: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muḥammad], and be not like the companion of the fish [i.e., Jonah] when he called out while he was distressed.

verses.text: لَّوْلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
verses.translation: If not that a favor [i.e., mercy] from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured.

verses.text: فَٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.translation: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.

verses.text: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes [i.e., looks] when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.

verses.text: ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
verses.translation: The Inevitable Reality -

verses.text: مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
verses.translation: What is the Inevitable Reality?

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌۢ بِٱلْقَارِعَةِ
verses.translation: Thamūd and ʿAad denied the Striking Calamity [i.e., the Resurrection].

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ
verses.translation: So as for Thamūd, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].

verses.text: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
verses.translation: And as for ʿAad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind

verses.text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Which He [i.e., ALLAH] imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.

verses.text: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Then do you see of them any remains?

verses.text: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ
verses.translation: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.

verses.text: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
verses.translation: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].

verses.text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ
verses.translation: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried you [i.e., your ancestors] in the sailing ship

verses.text: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ
verses.translation: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast

verses.text: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً
verses.translation: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow [i.e., stroke] -

verses.text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: Then on that Day, the Occurrence [i.e., Resurrection] will occur,

verses.text: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِىَ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاهِيَةٌ
verses.translation: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.

verses.text: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَـٰنِيَةٌ
verses.translation: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].

verses.text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
verses.translation: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
verses.translation: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!

verses.text: إِنِّى ظَنَنتُ أَنِّى مُلَـٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."

verses.text: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: So he will be in a pleasant life -

verses.text: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: In an elevated garden,

verses.text: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ
verses.translation: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record

verses.text: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: And had not known what is my account.

verses.text: يَـٰلَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلْقَاضِيَةَ
verses.translation: I wish it [i.e., my death] had been the decisive one.

verses.text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّى مَالِيَهْ ۜ
verses.translation: My wealth has not availed me.

verses.text: هَلَكَ عَنِّى سُلْطَـٰنِيَهْ
verses.translation: Gone from me is my authority."

verses.text: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
verses.translation: [ALLAH will say], "Seize him and shackle him.

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
verses.translation: Then into Hellfire drive him.

verses.text: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ
verses.translation: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Indeed, he did not used to believe in ALLAH, the Most Great,

verses.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.

verses.text: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ ٱلْيَوْمَ هَـٰهُنَا حَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend

verses.text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ
verses.translation: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;

verses.text: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْخَـٰطِـُٔونَ
verses.translation: None will eat it except the sinners.

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: So I swear by what you see

verses.text: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And what you do not see

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: [That] indeed, it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is the word of a noble Messenger.

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.

verses.text: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.

verses.text: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ ٱلْأَقَاوِيلِ
verses.translation: And if he [i.e., Muḥammad] had made up about Us some [false] sayings,

verses.text: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: We would have seized him by the right hand;

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ ٱلْوَتِينَ
verses.translation: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.

verses.text: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَـٰجِزِينَ
verses.translation: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is a reminder for the righteous.

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.

verses.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

verses.text: سَأَلَ سَآئِلٌۢ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ
verses.translation: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen

verses.text: لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٌ
verses.translation: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.

verses.text: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِى ٱلْمَعَارِجِ
verses.translation: [It is] from ALLAH, owner of the ways of ascent.

verses.text: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.translation: The angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: So be patient with gracious patience.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُۥ بَعِيدًا
verses.translation: Indeed, they see it [as] distant,

verses.text: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: But We see it [as] near.

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلْمُهْلِ
verses.translation: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,

verses.text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ
verses.translation: And the mountains will be like wool,

verses.text: وَلَا يَسْـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
verses.translation: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,

verses.text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children.

verses.text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ
verses.translation: And his wife and his brother

verses.text: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِى تُـْٔوِيهِ
verses.translation: And his nearest kindred who shelter him.

verses.text: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.translation: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.

verses.text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],

verses.text: نَزَّاعَةً لِّلشَّوَىٰ
verses.translation: A remover of exteriors.

verses.text: تَدْعُوا۟ مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]

verses.text: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.

verses.text: ۞ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
verses.translation: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:

verses.text: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
verses.translation: When evil touches him, impatient,

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
verses.translation: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Except the observers of prayer -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَآئِمُونَ
verses.translation: Those who are constant in their prayer

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: And those within whose wealth is a known right

verses.text: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: For the petitioner and the deprived -

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.translation: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -

verses.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.translation: And those who guard their private parts

verses.text: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -

verses.text: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
verses.translation: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَـٰدَٰتِهِمْ قَآئِمُونَ
verses.translation: And those who are in their testimonies upright

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: They will be in gardens, honored.

verses.text: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
verses.translation: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muḥammad],

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
verses.translation: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?

verses.text: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?

verses.text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able

verses.text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.

verses.text: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.translation: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.

verses.text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

verses.text: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner -

verses.text: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: To worship ALLAH, fear Him and obey me.

verses.text: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: He [i.e., ALLAH] will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] ALLAH, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew."

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

verses.text: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.translation: But my invitation increased them not except in flight [i.e., aversion].

verses.text: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.translation: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.translation: Then I invited them publicly.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.translation: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

verses.text: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.translation: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

verses.text: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا
verses.translation: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

verses.text: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.translation: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to ALLAH [due] grandeur

verses.text: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.translation: While He has created you in stages?

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.translation: Do you not consider how ALLAH has created seven heavens in layers

verses.text: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.translation: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.translation: And ALLAH has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.translation: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.translation: And ALLAH has made for you the earth an expanse

verses.text: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.translation: That you may follow therein roads of passage.'"

verses.text: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

verses.text: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.translation: And they conspired an immense conspiracy

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.translation: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwāʿ or Yaghūth and Yaʿūq and Nasr.'

verses.text: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا
verses.translation: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

verses.text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides ALLAH [any] helpers.

verses.text: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.translation: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

verses.text: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.translation: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

verses.text: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
verses.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."

verses.text: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
verses.translation: Say, [O Muḥammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur’ān [i.e., recitation].

verses.text: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.translation: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.translation: And that our foolish one [i.e., Iblees] has been saying about ALLAH an excessive transgression.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.translation: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about ALLAH a lie.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.translation: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden [i.e., sin].

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: And they had thought, as you thought, that ALLAH would never send anyone [as a messenger].

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.translation: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
verses.translation: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.translation: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.translation: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
verses.translation: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to ALLAH upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.translation: And when we heard the guidance [i.e., the Qur’ān], we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
verses.translation: And among us are Muslims [in submission to ALLAH], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.translation: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'

verses.text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
verses.translation: And [ALLAH revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant rain [i.e., provision].

verses.text: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.translation: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.

verses.text: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for ALLAH, so do not invoke with ALLAH anyone.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.translation: And that when the Servant [i.e., Prophet] of ALLAH stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."

verses.text: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say, [O Muḥammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from ALLAH anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.

verses.text: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
verses.translation: But [I have for you] only notification from ALLAH, and His messages." And whoever disobeys ALLAH and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.

verses.text: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
verses.translation: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."

verses.text: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
verses.translation: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before him [i.e., each messenger] and behind him observers

verses.text: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
verses.translation: That he [i.e., Muḥammad (ﷺ)] may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.translation: O you who wraps himself [in clothing]

verses.text: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

verses.text: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

verses.text: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: Or add to it, and recite the Qur’ān with measured recitation.

verses.text: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.

verses.text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.

verses.text: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.

verses.text: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.

verses.text: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

verses.text: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.

verses.text: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.translation: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire.

verses.text: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

verses.text: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white-haired?

verses.text: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.

verses.text: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ
verses.translation: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muḥammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And ALLAH determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur’ān. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of ALLAH and others fighting for the cause of ALLAH. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakāh and loan ALLAH a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with ALLAH. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of ALLAH. Indeed, ALLAH is Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O you who covers himself [with a garment],

verses.text: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: Arise and warn.

verses.text: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: And your Lord glorify.

verses.text: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: And your clothing purify.

verses.text: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ
verses.translation: And uncleanliness avoid.

verses.text: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: And do not confer favor to acquire more.

verses.text: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ
verses.translation: But for your Lord be patient.

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: And when the trumpet is blown,

verses.text: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: That Day will be a difficult day

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.translation: For the disbelievers - not easy.

verses.text: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.translation: Leave Me with the one I created alone

verses.text: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
verses.translation: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

verses.text: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.translation: And children present [with him]

verses.text: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.translation: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].

verses.text: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: Then he desires that I should add more.

verses.text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.translation: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.

verses.text: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: I will cover him with arduous torment.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.

verses.text: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

verses.text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

verses.text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: Then he considered [again];

verses.text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: Then he frowned and scowled;

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Then he turned back and was arrogant

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].

verses.text: إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: This is not but the word of a human being."

verses.text: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: I will drive him into Saqar.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is Saqar?

verses.text: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],

verses.text: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: Altering [i.e., blackening] the skins.

verses.text: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Over it are nineteen [angels].

verses.text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is disease [i.e., hypocrisy] and the disbelievers will say, "What does ALLAH intend by this as an example?" Thus does ALLAH send astray whom He wills and guide whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And it [i.e., mention of the Fire] is not but a reminder to humanity.

verses.text: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: No! By the moon.

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it departs.

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: And [by] the morning when it brightens,

verses.text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, it [i.e., the Fire] is of the greatest [afflictions].

verses.text: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: As a warning to humanity -

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.

verses.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained.

verses.text: إِلَّآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Except the companions of the right,.

verses.text: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: About the criminals,

verses.text: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ
verses.translation: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,

verses.text: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: Nor did we used to feed the poor.

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ
verses.translation: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: Until there came to us the certainty [i.e., death]."

verses.text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَـٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِينَ
verses.translation: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away.

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: As if they were alarmed donkeys.

verses.text: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ
verses.translation: Fleeing from a lion?

verses.text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ
verses.translation: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is a reminder.

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then whoever wills will remember it.

verses.text: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: And they will not remember except that ALLAH wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

verses.text: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

verses.text: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
verses.translation: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?

verses.text: بَلَىٰ قَـٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.

verses.text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
verses.translation: But man desires to continue in sin.

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ
verses.translation: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

verses.text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: So when vision is dazzled.

verses.text: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the moon darkens.

verses.text: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the sun and the moon are joined,

verses.text: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"

verses.text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: No! There is no refuge.

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.

verses.text: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,

verses.text: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Even if he presents his excuses.

verses.text: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
verses.translation: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muḥammad], to hasten with it [i.e., recitation of the Qur’ān].

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.

verses.text: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَـٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: No! But you [i.e., mankind] love the immediate

verses.text: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ
verses.translation: And leave [i.e., neglect] the Hereafter.

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Looking at their Lord.

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,

verses.text: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ
verses.translation: No! When it [i.e., the soul] has reached the collar bones

verses.text: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"

verses.text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: And he [i.e., the dying one] is certain that it is the [time of] separation

verses.text: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
verses.translation: And the leg is wound about the leg,

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

verses.text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And he [i.e., the disbeliever] had not believed, nor had he prayed.

verses.text: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: But [instead], he denied and turned away.

verses.text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].

verses.text: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Woe to you, and woe!

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Then woe to you, and woe!

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he was a clinging clot, and [ALLAH] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

verses.text: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.

verses.text: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْـِۧىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

verses.text: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

verses.text: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kāfūr,

verses.text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of ALLAH will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

verses.text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

verses.text: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

verses.text: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: [Saying], "We feed you only for the face [i.e., approval] of ALLAH. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.

verses.text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

verses.text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: So ALLAH will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

verses.text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

verses.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.

verses.text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

verses.text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.translation: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

verses.text: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

verses.text: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

verses.text: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: [From] a fountain within it [i.e., Paradise] named Salsabeel.

verses.text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

verses.text: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon them [i.e., the inhabitants] will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muḥammad], the Qur’ān progressively.

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt [i.e., praise] Him a long [part of the] night.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.

verses.text: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: And you do not will except that ALLAH wills. Indeed, ALLAH is ever Knowing and Wise.

verses.text: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

verses.text: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَـٰتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

verses.text: فَٱلْعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: And the winds that blow violently

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

verses.text: فَٱلْفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: And those [angels] who bring criterion

verses.text: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And those [angels] who deliver a message.

verses.text: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: As justification or warning,

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

verses.text: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: So when the stars are obliterated

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is opened

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are blown away

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: And when the messengers' time has come...

verses.text: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: For what Day was it postponed?

verses.text: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: For the Day of Judgement.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the former peoples?

verses.text: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We will follow them with the later ones.

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Thus do We deal with the criminals.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?

verses.text: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: And We placed it in a firm lodging [i.e., the womb]

verses.text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: For a known extent.

verses.text: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a container

verses.text: أَحْيَآءً وَأَمْوَٰتًا
verses.translation: Of the living and the dead?

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns.

verses.text: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."

verses.text: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍ كَٱلْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَـٰلَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is a Day they will not speak,

verses.text: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَـٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.

verses.text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs

verses.text: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And fruits from whatever they desire,

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then in what statement after it [i.e., the Qur’ān] will they believe?

verses.text: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: About what are they asking one another?

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: About the great news -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: That over which they are in disagreement.

verses.text: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: No! They are going to know.

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Then, no! They are going to know.

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَـٰدًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

verses.text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: And the mountains as stakes?

verses.text: وَخَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا
verses.translation: And We created you in pairs.

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: And made your sleep [a means for] rest

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: And made the night as clothing.

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: And made the day for livelihood.

verses.text: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens].

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: And made [therein] a burning lamp

verses.text: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water.

verses.text: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation.

verses.text: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: And gardens of entwined growth.

verses.text: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَـٰتًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

verses.text: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًا
verses.translation: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways.

verses.text: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.

verses.text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait

verses.text: لِّلطَّـٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًا
verses.translation: For the transgressors, a place of return,

verses.text: لَّـٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: In which they will remain for ages [unending].

verses.text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink.

verses.text: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -

verses.text: جَزَآءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: An appropriate recompense.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Indeed, they were not expecting an account

verses.text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.

verses.text: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ كِتَـٰبًا
verses.translation: But all things We have enumerated in writing.

verses.text: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."

verses.text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -

verses.text: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَـٰبًا
verses.translation: Gardens and grapevines.

verses.text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age.

verses.text: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: And a full cup.

verses.text: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا
verses.translation: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -

verses.text: جَزَآءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,

verses.text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: The Day that the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
verses.translation: That is the True [i.e., certain] Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have warned you of an impending punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَـٰتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By those [angels] who extract with violence

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَـٰتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: And [by] those who remove with ease

verses.text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَـٰتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming

verses.text: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَـٰتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: And those who race each other in a race

verses.text: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And those who arrange [each] matter,

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],

verses.text: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: There will follow it the subsequent [one].

verses.text: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,

verses.text: أَبْصَـٰرُهَا خَـٰشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled.

verses.text: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?

verses.text: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَـٰمًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: Even if we should be decayed bones?"

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."

verses.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, it will be but one shout,

verses.text: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -

verses.text: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwā,

verses.text: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

verses.text: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

verses.text: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"

verses.text: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْـَٔايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And he showed him the greatest sign,

verses.text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: But he [i.e., Pharaoh] denied and disobeyed.

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he turned his back, striving [i.e., plotting].

verses.text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: And he gathered [his people] and called out.

verses.text: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

verses.text: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
verses.translation: So ALLAH seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression]..

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a lesson [i.e., warning] for whoever would fear [ALLAH].

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا
verses.translation: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? He [i.e., ALLAH] constructed it.

verses.text: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.

verses.text: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: And after that He spread the earth.

verses.text: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا
verses.translation: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,

verses.text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the mountains He set firmly

verses.text: مَتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ
verses.translation: As enjoyment [i.e., provision] for you and your grazing livestock.

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

verses.text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: So as for he who transgressed

verses.text: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: And preferred the life of the world,

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا
verses.translation: They ask you, [O Muḥammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

verses.text: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: To your Lord is its finality.

verses.text: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا
verses.translation: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

verses.text: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: He [i.e., the Prophet (ﷺ) ] frowned and turned away

verses.text: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

verses.text: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: But what would make you perceive, [O Muḥammad], that perhaps he might be purified

verses.text: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

verses.text: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: As for he who thinks himself without need,

verses.text: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: To him you give attention.

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

verses.text: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: While he fears [ALLAH],

verses.text: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: From him you are distracted.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, they [i.e., these verses] are a reminder;

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: So whoever wills may remember it.

verses.text: فِى صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,

verses.text: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ
verses.translation: Exalted and purified,

verses.text: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,

verses.text: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Noble and dutiful.

verses.text: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Destroyed [i.e., cursed] is man; how disbelieving is he.

verses.text: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
verses.translation: From what thing [i.e., substance] did He create him?

verses.text: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then He eased the way for him;

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

verses.text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: No! He [i.e., man] has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

verses.text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
verses.translation: Then let mankind look at his food -

verses.text: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: How We poured down water in torrents,

verses.text: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

verses.text: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: And caused to grow within it grain

verses.text: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: And grapes and herbage

verses.text: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: And olive and palm trees

verses.text: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: And gardens of dense shrubbery

verses.text: وَفَـٰكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: And fruit and grass -

verses.text: مَّتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ
verses.translation: [As] enjoyment [i.e., provision] for you and your grazing livestock.

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
verses.translation: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

verses.text: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: And his mother and his father

verses.text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: And his wife and his children,

verses.text: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -

verses.text: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

verses.text: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Blackness will cover them.

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are removed

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the wild beasts are gathered

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas are filled with flame

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the souls are paired

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

verses.text: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: For what sin she was killed

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the pages are spread [i.e., made public]

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: And when the sky is stripped away

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when Paradise is brought near,

verses.text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: So I swear by the retreating stars -

verses.text: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: Those that run [their courses] and disappear [i.e., set]

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: And by the night as it closes in

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: And by the dawn when it breathes [i.e., stirs]

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: [That] indeed, it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger [i.e., Gabriel]

verses.text: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

verses.text: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

verses.text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: And your companion [i.e., Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ) ] is not [at all] mad.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: And he has already seen him [i.e., Gabriel] in the clear horizon.

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: And he [i.e., Muḥammad (ﷺ)] is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: And it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

verses.text: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: So where are you going?

verses.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And you do not will except that ALLAH wills - Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sky breaks apart

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars fall, scattering,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas are erupted

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered [i.e., exposed],

verses.text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

verses.text: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: No! But you deny the Recompense.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَـٰفِظِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

verses.text: كِرَامًا كَـٰتِبِينَ
verses.translation: Noble and recording;

verses.text: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
