verses.translation: They know whatever you do.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

verses.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

verses.text: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

verses.text: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
verses.translation: And never therefrom will they be absent.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

verses.text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

verses.text: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with ALLAH.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe to those who give less [than due],

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

verses.text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

verses.text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

verses.text: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: For a tremendous Day -

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

verses.text: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

verses.text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

verses.text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in ʿilliyyūn.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is ʿilliyyūn?

verses.text: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

verses.text: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to ALLAH].

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On adorned couches, observing.

verses.text: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

verses.text: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

verses.text: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
verses.translation: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

verses.text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

verses.text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: A spring from which those near [to ALLAH] drink.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.translation: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

verses.text: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَـٰفِظِينَ
verses.translation: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

verses.text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On adorned couches, observing.

verses.text: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the sky has split [open]

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And has listened [i.e., responded] to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: And when the earth has been extended

verses.text: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it].

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And has listened [i.e., responded] to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ
verses.translation: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
verses.translation: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

verses.text: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: He will be judged with an easy account

verses.text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: And return to his people in happiness.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
verses.translation: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

verses.text: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: He will cry out for destruction

verses.text: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to ALLAH].

verses.text: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever, of him, Seeing.

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: So I swear by the twilight glow

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: And [by] the night and what it envelops

verses.text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

verses.text: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: [That] you will surely embark upon [i.e., experience] state after state.

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

verses.text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: And when the Qur’ān is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to ALLAH]?

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: But those who have disbelieved deny,

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: And ALLAH is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

verses.text: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
verses.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the sky containing great stars

verses.text: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: And [by] the promised Day

verses.text: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

verses.text: قُتِلَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: Destroyed [i.e., cursed] were the companions of the trench

verses.text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,

verses.text: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: When they were sitting near it.

verses.text: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

verses.text: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: And they resented them not except because they believed in ALLAH, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And ALLAH, over all things, is Witness.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

verses.text: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, the assault [i.e., vengeance] of your Lord is severe.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

verses.text: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

verses.text: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: Effecter of what He intends.

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

verses.text: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamūd?

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ
verses.translation: While ALLAH encompasses them from behind.

verses.text: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: But this is an honored Qur’ān

verses.text: فِى لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ
verses.translation: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the sky and the night comer

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

verses.text: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: It is the piercing star

verses.text: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

verses.text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: So let man observe from what he was created.

verses.text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

verses.text: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
verses.translation: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, He [i.e., ALLAH], to return him [to life], is Able.

verses.text: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
verses.translation: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: Then he [i.e., man] will have no power or any helper.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By the sky which sends back

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: And [by] the earth which splits,

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, it [i.e., the Qur’ān] is a decisive statement,

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: And it is not amusement.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

verses.text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: But I am planning a plan.

verses.text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا
verses.translation: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

verses.text: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who created and proportioned

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And who destined and [then] guided

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And who brings out the pasture

verses.text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: And [then] makes it black stubble.

verses.text: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: We will make you recite, [O Muḥammad], and you will not forget,

verses.text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Except what ALLAH should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

verses.text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And We will ease you toward ease.

verses.text: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

verses.text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: He who fears [ALLAH] will be reminded.

verses.text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: But the wretched one will avoid it

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: Neither dying therein nor living.

verses.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

verses.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

verses.text: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But you prefer the worldly life,

verses.text: وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

verses.text: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَـٰشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَـٰشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,

verses.text: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: Working [hard] and exhausted.

verses.text: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

verses.text: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍ
verses.translation: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

verses.text: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

verses.text: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.

verses.text: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: With their effort [they are] satisfied

verses.text: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: In an elevated garden,

verses.text: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَـٰغِيَةً
verses.translation: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

verses.text: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Within it is a flowing spring.

verses.text: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: Within it are couches raised high

verses.text: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: And cups put in place

verses.text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: And cushions lined up

verses.text: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: And carpets spread around.

verses.text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: And at the sky - how it is raised?

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

verses.text: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: So remind, [O Muḥammad]; you are only a reminder.

verses.text: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: You are not over them a controller.

verses.text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: However, he who turns away and disbelieves

verses.text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Then ALLAH will punish him with the greatest punishment.

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: Indeed, to Us is their return.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

verses.text: وَٱلْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By the dawn

verses.text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: And [by] ten nights

verses.text: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it passes,

verses.text: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with ʿAad -

verses.text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,

verses.text: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
verses.translation: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

verses.text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ
verses.translation: And [with] Thamūd, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

verses.text: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes?

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
verses.translation: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

verses.text: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: And increased therein the corruption.

verses.text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ
verses.translation: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: No! But you do not honor the orphan

verses.text: وَلَا تَحَـٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

verses.text: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

verses.text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: And you love wealth with immense love.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed

verses.text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

verses.text: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but how [i.e., what good] to him will be the remembrance?

verses.text: يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى
verses.translation: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

verses.text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

verses.text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

verses.text: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

verses.text: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَـٰدِى
verses.translation: And enter among My [righteous] servants

verses.text: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
verses.translation: And enter My Paradise."

verses.text: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: I swear by this city [i.e., Makkah]

verses.text: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: And you, [O Muḥammad], are free of restriction in this city

verses.text: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

verses.text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man into hardship.

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

verses.text: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that no one has seen him?

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Have We not made for him two eyes?

verses.text: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: And a tongue and two lips?

verses.text: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: And have shown him the two ways?

verses.text: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

verses.text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: It is the freeing of a slave

verses.text: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

verses.text: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: An orphan of near relationship

verses.text: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Or a needy person in misery

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Those are the companions of the right.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
verses.translation: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

verses.text: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ
verses.translation: Over them will be fire closed in.

verses.text: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and its brightness

verses.text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the moon when it follows it

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the day when it displays it

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it covers [i.e., conceals] it

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

verses.text: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

verses.text: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

verses.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: He has succeeded who purifies it,

verses.text: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: Thamūd denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

verses.text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا
verses.translation: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

verses.text: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا
verses.translation: And the messenger of ALLAH [i.e., Ṣāliḥ] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of ALLAH or [prevent her from] her drink."

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

verses.text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَـٰهَا
verses.translation: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night when it covers

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And [by] the day when it appears

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And [by] He who created the male and female,

verses.text: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: As for he who gives and fears ALLAH

verses.text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And believes in the best [reward],

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We will ease him toward ease.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

verses.text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And denies the best [reward],

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We will ease him toward difficulty.

verses.text: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed, to us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

verses.text: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

verses.text: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who had denied and turned away.

verses.text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: But the righteous one will avoid it

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

verses.text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: But only seeking the face [i.e., acceptance] of his Lord, Most High.

verses.text: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And he is going to be satisfied.

verses.text: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the morning brightness

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

verses.text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muḥammad], nor has He detested [you].

verses.text: وَلَلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

verses.text: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And He found you lost and guided [you],

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

verses.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

verses.text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: Did We not expand for you, [O Muḥammad], your breast?

verses.text: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: And We removed from you your burden

verses.text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: Which had weighed upon your back

verses.text: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: And raised high for you your repute.

verses.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease [i.e., relief].

verses.text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

verses.text: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ
verses.translation: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

verses.text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب
verses.translation: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.

verses.text: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive

verses.text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: And [by] Mount Sinai

verses.text: وَهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: And [by] this secure city [i.e., Makkah],

verses.text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;

verses.text: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَـٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.translation: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.

verses.text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?

verses.text: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is not ALLAH the most just of judges?

verses.text: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
verses.translation: Recite in the name of your Lord who created

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: Created man from a clinging substance.

verses.text: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: Who taught by the pen

verses.text: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: Taught man that which he knew not.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ
verses.translation: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses

verses.text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who forbids

verses.text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: A servant when he prays?

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Have you seen if he is upon guidance

verses.text: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Or enjoins righteousness?

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Does he not know that ALLAH sees?

verses.text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock

verses.text: نَاصِيَةٍ كَـٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: A lying, sinning forelock.

verses.text: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then let him call his associates;

verses.text: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: We will call the angels of Hell.

verses.text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to ALLAH].

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent it [i.e., the Qur’ān] down during the Night of Decree.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

verses.text: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

verses.text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: The angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.

verses.text: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence

verses.text: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: A Messenger from ALLAH, reciting purified scriptures

verses.text: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: Within which are correct writings [i.e., rulings and laws].

verses.text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.

verses.text: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: And they were not commanded except to worship ALLAH, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakāh. And that is the correct religion.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.

verses.text: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
verses.translation: Their reward with their Lord will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, ALLAH being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.

verses.text: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake

verses.text: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: And the earth discharges its burdens

verses.text: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -

verses.text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: That Day, it will report its news

verses.text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: Because your Lord has inspired [i.e., commanded] it.

verses.text: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
verses.translation: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

verses.text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

verses.text: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

verses.text: وَٱلْعَـٰدِيَـٰتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: By the racers, panting,

verses.text: فَٱلْمُورِيَـٰتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

verses.text: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: And the chargers at dawn,

verses.text: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,

verses.text: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And indeed, he is to that a witness.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

verses.text: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

verses.text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: And that within the breasts is obtained,

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ
verses.translation: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Aware.

verses.text: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The Striking Calamity -

verses.text: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the Striking Calamity?

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,

verses.text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
verses.translation: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],

verses.text: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: He will be in a pleasant life.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
verses.translation: But as for one whose scales are light,

verses.text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: His refuge will be an abyss.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what that is?

verses.text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ
verses.translation: It is a Fire, intensely hot.

verses.text: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you

verses.text: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: Until you visit the graveyards.

verses.text: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: No! You are going to know.

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Then, no! You are going to know.

verses.text: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...

verses.text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: You will surely see the Hellfire.

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.

verses.text: وَٱلْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By time,

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, mankind is in loss,

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Woe to every scorner and mocker

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
verses.translation: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

verses.text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ
verses.translation: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

verses.text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: It is the fire of ALLAH, [eternally] fueled,

verses.text: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ
verses.translation: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

verses.text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, it [i.e., Hellfire] will be closed down upon them

verses.text: فِى عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ
verses.translation: In extended columns.

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Have you not considered, [O Muḥammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

verses.text: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

verses.text: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

verses.text: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍۭ
verses.translation: And He made them like eaten straw.

verses.text: لِإِيلَـٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

verses.text: إِۦلَـٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

verses.text: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
verses.translation: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

verses.text: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

verses.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

verses.text: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: So woe to those who pray

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ
verses.translation: Those who make show [of their deeds]

verses.text: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: And withhold [simple] assistance.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muḥammad], al-Kawthar.

verses.text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
verses.translation: So pray to your Lord and offer sacrifice [to Him alone].

verses.text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

verses.text: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say, "O disbelievers,

verses.text: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: I do not worship what you worship.

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

verses.text: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ
verses.translation: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."

verses.text: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: When the victory of ALLAH has come and the conquest,

verses.text: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of ALLAH in multitudes,

verses.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.

verses.text: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: May the hands of Abū Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

verses.text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

verses.text: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

verses.text: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

verses.text: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ
verses.translation: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

verses.text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Say, "He is ALLAH, [who is] One,

verses.text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: ALLAH, the Eternal Refuge.

verses.text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: He neither begets nor is born,

verses.text: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
verses.translation: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."

verses.text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak

verses.text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: From the evil of that which He created

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَـٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."

verses.text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

verses.text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: The Sovereign of mankind,

verses.text: إِلَـٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: The God of mankind,

verses.text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

verses.text: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
verses.translation: From among the jinn and mankind".
